nodes.text: Ch'ord Sy'fon was a male Bothan information broker on Coruscant acquainted with Sagoro Autem.

After the Republic was turned into the Galactic Empire under the rule of Emperor Palpatine, Ch'ord Sy'fon met with Sagoro Autem in a cantina at the lower levels of Coruscant. When Autem learned of his imminent arrest by Darth Vader, he called in a favor from Sy'fon and found passage offworld. However in reality, Sy'fon was forced to betray his friend and contacted Vader with information regarding Autem.
